TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OutputAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class OutputAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class OutputAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 此属性由任务编写器用于将某些任务参数指定为 "输出"。

span.span: This attribute is used by task writers to designate certain task parameters as "outputs".

summary.span: 生成引擎只允许使用任务参数 (也就是说，使用此属性标记的任务类 ".NET 属性") 可从任务输出数据。

span.span: The build engine will only allow task parameters (i.e. the task class' .NET properties) that are marked with this attribute to output data from a task.

summary.span: 项目作者只能在任务的输出标记中使用用此特性标记的参数 < > 。

span.span: Project authors can only use parameters marked with this attribute in a task's <Output> tag.

summary.span: 生成引擎可能会将所有任务参数（包括标记为此属性的参数）视为任务的输入。

span.span: All task parameters, including those marked with this attribute, may be treated as inputs to a task by the build engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 引擎将只允许使用此属性标记的任务属性来输出任务的数据。The [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine will only allow task properties marked with this attribute to output data from a task. 项目作者只能在项目文件的元素中使用标记有此特性的属性 `Output` 。Project authors can only use properties marked with this attribute in the `Output` element of a project file. 所有其他任务属性被视为任务的输入。All other task properties are treated as inputs to a task. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅 [使用属性扩展元数据](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Extending Metadata Using Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建一个或多个目录的任务的代码。The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories. [!code-csharp[msbuild_MakeDirTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_MakeDirTask/CS/msbuild_MakeDirTask.cs#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]
